subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: After this last week of ghastly publicity, American cycling buffs insist the sport has moved far ahead of other pro sports. That may be true, but it is hardly a compliment.
snippet: After this last week of ghastly publicity, American cycling buffs insist the sport has moved far ahead of other pro sports. That may be true, but it is hardly a compliment.
